title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks deliver best weekly performance since November 2020 as S&P 500 jumps 6% from last week - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks deliver best weekly performance since November 2020 as S&P 500 jumps 6% from last week  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks turned higher on Friday and were on track for a fourth consecutive day of gains. The major equity indexes also headed for weekly advances as traders took favorably the Federal Reserve's measured first move on raising interest rates.
